Dating: 1ST INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); 1ST INTERMEDIATE PERIOD; MIDDLE KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Stela belonging to Heniheriib
Description: False door stela which belonged to Heniheriib. The upper lintel and part of the cyma are missing, which is why of the inscriptions only those on the jambs of the frame are preserved. The central panel has suffered rather a lot of damage, although we can distinguish the deceased sitting before the offering table. The piece bears remnants of red paint.
